name: Underworld Blunder
description:
Uh oh!
A pacifist got send down to the Underworld and now must venture north to convince the Lord of the Underworld that they don't belong. On their journey many demons will try and attack them, either in an effort to destroy them or tempt you to fight back and earn your place in the Underworld.

Use WASD to move, E to interact, Space to speed up combat.

Bosses get new dialogue once you have beaten them.
